rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall with a reception area incorporating local materials and traditional motifs to welcome residents in accordance with Vastu principles.
Open living space featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light as per Colonial style, ensuring an airy ambiance and adherence to building norms.
Efficient kitchen layout designed with ample storage, proper ventilation, and integration with the living area for a cohesive colonial interior.
Dining space adjacent to the living room offering natural light through floor-to-ceiling windows and designed following local building codes.
Compact yet functional bathroom design with modern fixtures aligned with Vastu recommendations for utility areas.

openings.description: Traditional door design ensuring privacy and security.
Floor-to-ceiling window for enhanced natural light in the living area.
Door connecting kitchen to dining area and living space.
Floor-to-ceiling window providing ample illumination for the dining space.
Privacy door ensuring compliance with building norms and aesthetic design.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom designed in Colonial style with a focus on comfort and privacy. Incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows for improved air circulation.
Balcony attached to the master bedroom providing outdoor access and natural light, following Vastu principles for open spaces.
Private bathroom integrated with the master bedroom ensuring convenience and adherence to building norms.

openings.description: Traditional door with adequate clearance for furniture as per colonial design norms.
Floor-to-ceiling window to maximize natural light and ventilation in the bedroom.
